definition: The term "physisch" refers to something related to the body or physical aspects. It is commonly used to describe phenomena, actions, or characteristics that are associated with the material or tangible world.

examples.german: Physische Aktivität ist wichtig für die Gesundheit.
examples.english: Physical activity is important for health.

examples.german: Die physische Belastung war zu hoch.
examples.english: The physical strain was too high.

examples.german: Die physische Präsenz des Künstlers war beeindruckend.
examples.english: The physical presence of the artist was impressive.

examples.german: Die physische Welt unterscheidet sich von der virtuellen Welt.
examples.english: The physical world is different from the virtual world.
